mapper.select: WITH AllDays AS ( SELECT generate_series(1, 31) AS day_of_month ), FilteredCoordinates AS ( SELECT *, LAG(geom) OVER (PARTITION BY date ORDER BY time) AS prev_geom, EXTRACT(day FROM date) AS day FROM local_db JOIN AllDays ON AllDays.day_of_month = EXTRACT(day FROM date) WHERE extract(year FROM date) = #{selectedYear} AND extract(month FROM date) = #{selectedMonth} AND car_num = #{selectedCarNum} AND is_done = false ), Distances AS ( SELECT day_of_month, COALESCE(ST_Distance(ST_SetSRID(prev_geom, 4326)::geography, ST_SetSRID(geom, 4326)::geography), 0) AS distance FROM FilteredCoordinates ) SELECT ad.day_of_month, COALESCE(SUM(COALESCE(distance, 0)), 0) AS no_clean_distance FROM AllDays ad LEFT JOIN Distances d ON ad.day_of_month = d.day_of_month GROUP BY ad.day_of_month ORDER BY ad.day_of_month;
